column4: well the ubuntu-base is fairly small, inspect the list in a terminal, apt-cache show ubuntu-base -- be careful take out the wrong thing and you will no longer have a functioning system
I have not included the next step, because trust me on this, if you don't know what to do next you don't want to try trimming anything out of it.
so check does anything depend on it, and are you happy for that to go also :)
